remarks: Inner product of two sums.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ip2dii.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ip2dii.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
ip2dii.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ip2dii.u $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
ip2dii.a $e |- A e. X $.
ip2dii.b $e |- B e. X $.
ip2dii.c $e |- C e. X $.
ip2dii.d $e |- D e. X $.
ip2dii $p |- ( ( A G B ) P ( C G D ) ) = ( ( ( A P C ) + ( B P D ) ) + ( ( A P D ) + ( B P C ) ) ) $.
